animeTitle: Utawarerumono: Tusukuru-koujo no Karei Naru Hibi
otherNames: Utawarerumono: Imperial Princess Tusukuru's Splendid Days,
synopsis: Included with the premium collection release of the PS4 remake of Utawarerumono: Chiriyukumono e no Komoriuta. The anime will tell the story of Kuon's childhood days.
